Rewards Rate: Get 1% cashback on all retail purchases and 3% cashback on selected transactions through YES Cart.
Reward Redemption: The earned cashback is directly credited to the cardholders' accounts.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee of Rs. 499 is waived on spending Rs. 1.2 lakhs or more in the previous anniversary year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver capped at Rs. 250 per month.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount or a minimum of Rs. 500

product_details: 3% cash back on selected purchases made using this card.
1% cashback on all other retail transactions
Automatic conversion of large transactions into EMIs.
Spend-based waiver of the annual membership fee.
Exciting additional deals on YES Cart.
